QuestData.Title: Hammer Time
QuestData.Description: The three of us have been arguing for weeks over whose weapons are superior.$B$BI won't let anyone tell me my maces are second best. Kilram's axes and Seril's swords could never match the pure strength of my craft.$B$BI'm tired of arguing. It's time to show those two I'm right with a demonstration. If you would, dear, head outside and tell Deez Rocksnitch that I need the biggest boulder he can find!
QuestData.RewardText: Lilith wants a boulder moved inside the observatory, eh? That's my business: consolidated materials. I usually don't get individual buyers, but hey, I won't ask questions.
